{{cpp/title|hash&lt;small&gt;(std::experimental::shared_ptr)&lt;/small&gt;}}
{{cpp/experimental/shared_ptr/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=libfund_ts|1=
template&lt; class T &gt; struct hash&lt;std::experimental::shared_ptr&lt;T&gt;&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

The template specialization of {{lc|std::hash}} for {{c|std::experimental::shared_ptr&lt;T&gt;}} allows users to obtain hashes of objects of type {{c|std::experimental::shared_ptr&lt;T&gt;}}.

For a given {{c|1=std::experimental::shared_ptr&lt;T&gt; p}}, this specialization ensures that  {{c|1=std::hash&lt;std::experimental::shared_ptr&lt;T&gt;&gt;()(p) == std::hash&lt;T*&gt;()(p.get())}}. &lt;!-- This doesn't work for arrays, but is what the spec says. Reported to LWG. --&gt;
